place_info.title: Dr. Jash Ajmera | Psychiatrist and Psychotherapist in Surat | Sadbhav Neuropsychiatry Clinic
place_info.address: 209 vesu point, Vesu Main Road, above HDFC Bank, opp. vijya laxmi hall, Surat, Gujarat 395007, India

reviews.snippet: “A heartfelt thank you to Dr. Jash Ajmera for providing the best treatment and exceptional care for my mother. With your expertise and support, she is overcoming deep depression and anxiety. Truly grateful for your dedication and excellent service!”

extracted_snippet.original: “A heartfelt thank you to Dr. Jash Ajmera for providing the best treatment and exceptional care for my mother. With your expertise and support, she is overcoming deep depression and anxiety. Truly grateful for your dedication and excellent service!”

reviews.snippet: I have been seeing Dr Jash for more than 6 months , and the experience has truly been transformative. His compassionate approach, active listening skills, and tailored strategies have helped me navigate challenges with greater clarity and confidence. I highly recommend Dr Jash to anyone seeking professional and empathetic mental health support.

His compassionate approach, active listening skills, and tailored strategies have helped me navigate challenges with greater clarity and confidence. I highly recommend Dr Jash to anyone seeking professional and empathetic mental health support.

reviews.snippet: I have suffered from OCD and IBS for 12 years, which greatly impacted my life. Since starting treatment with Dr. Jash Ajmera, I’ve seen remarkable improvement and now live a happier, anxiety-free life. His expertise and compassionate care are exceptional, and I’m grateful he visits Ankleshwar every Saturday. He has truly been life-changing, and I highly recommend him to anyone facing similar challenges.

reviews.snippet: Dr. Jash Ajmera is young and energetic Doctor, his behaviour is polite enough. Staff is also cooperative. I am consulting for my friend and he is recovering better. Recommended for others.

reviews.snippet: Dr. Jash is outstanding and provides exceptional care. I highly recommend him to anyone seeking assistance with psychiatric disorders!!

reviews.snippet: I had a great experience consulting Dr. Jash Ajmera for my panic attacks. He is incredibly positive and made me feel comfortable, answering all my mental health questions without hesitation. Thanks to his treatment, I’m now fully recovered. The clinic staff is also excellent and supportive. Highly recommend!
